title: Baingan bharta
ingredients: ['2 medium aubergines, peeled and cut into pieces', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 onions, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '5cm piece root ginger, chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon brown mustard seeds', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 sprig coriander, to garnish']
